Description: Barely used, maybe 3hrs total as it was a back up, to a back up guitar. Will include pro hard shell case, ($120 value) & new installed strap locks, ($30 value). Smoke free environment. Dual graphite reinforcement rods run the length of the maple neck with speed profile to fortify it against the extremes of nature, buttressing it against warping. A speedy 12-16 compound radius fingerboard creates the ideal playing surface for fat riffs and easy chording near the black plastic nut while gradually flattening in the upper registers for lightning-quick solos and wide bends without fear of fretting out. A pair of EMG active humbucking pickups, an 85 neck pickup and 81 bridge pickup, generate versatile, huge and high output tones for brutal distortion and clear, crisp cleans. The Hardtail 6 strings-thru-body bridge produces massive sustain with enhanced note attack, and when combined with the Jackson-branded tuning machines, rock-solid tuning stability along with precise intonation. Classic Jackson appointments include the instantly recognizable piranha inlays, stable Dunlop dual-locking strap buttons, black hardware, single-ply neck binding and the Soloists ergonomically arched top for playing blazing licks with comfort. Sleek, refined, and dangerous, the SLATHXMG3-6 Soloist is art brought to life, tempered with high-tech performance for the ultimate metal machine.
Title: Jackson SLATHXMG3-6 Electric Guitar Gloss Black Rosewood Fingerboard
